description:
Tree pruning in the Tavistock Terrace/ Mercers Road Conservation Area
Notification has been received to carry out the following tree pruning works:
X 6 Purple Norway Maple - Lift crown to 3m above ground level, prune back from the property to give 2.5m clearence, crown thin by up to 15%.
X 1 Cherry - Lift to 4m above ground level, Crown reduce by 30% and balance.
X1 Whitebeam - Lift to 4m above ground level, Crown reduce by 30% and balance
X1 Laurel - Crown reduce by 30% and balance. Prune overhang to car park to neaten.
decision_conditions: The works specification has been lessened following negotiation with the agent, the crown reduction works have been removed from the notification as it was felt by the tree officer that these works are unnecessary to these relatively small trees and that allowing the trees to achieve larger canopies would be beneficial to the amenity of the conservation area.
